title: 4C/ID Model-Based Media Literacy Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital device usage skills and media consumption experience
context.additional_context: A blended learning course in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, combining pre-recorded lectures with in-person workshops.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the credibility and bias of diverse media content (news, SNS, advertisements) with 80% accuracy.
Learners can apply a three-step process to distinguish fake news from factual information using the "cognitive support" strategy of the 4C/ID model.
Learners can produce and share critical perspectives on social issues using media production tools at least twice.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
